Articles.Content:
I would love to post pictures so if anyone has a site i could post them to that would be great. Anyway I have began to colonize Minmus and as I write have a ship with 2 probes and one person heading to Minmus. There are around 14 or so kerbals waiting for him on the surface and 3 in orbit. It would be awesome if I could share this with you guys because it is my first large scale effort towards a planet (or moon.) Deimos coming in for his landing in a large flatish area leaving Mars alone and waiting for her landing at the colony.

\

Well darn.

Landed fine anyway.

Edited May 7, 2013 by dharak1
I use tinypic , but you have to upload every pic separately.
Would you believe, I actually use Facebook for mine.

tiny pic, if you dont mind your pics deleted after few days, leaving all older threads with text describing non existent pics

(useless)

There ya go guys! I have one shot of the rovers alpha beta and gamma, and a few of the city.

Use photobucket. Upload to the library and click on the picture. Then, right click the large picture and get the URL. Then you can post them directly onto the forums.

This is the first imgur photo.

Looks nice. Minmus is so much prettier than the Mun, even if it takes more dV to reach, and the gravity can be tricky sometimes.

I'm building a few settlements there myself, but am currently figuring out a re-fueling orbital station. In fact i'd suggest you try landing "pods" with a resuable skycrane. Fewer parts (engines n tanks mostly) are needed. And if you have wheeled pods, you can tow them with a heavier rover.
How do you Put it like that?
Click on Insert Image button above the message text (when editing/posting), and paste a link to your pic
Or, upload to Imgur, resize as you like, and just copy and paste the the code under thing that says "BBCode (message boards & forums)" into the body of your post.
Ok lets see if this works. I see the IMG things on other posts so, I hope it works.

my setup on minmus is pitiful...

the only positive i have is the giant wheels.

work in progress space station for minmus. a big lander w/ four smaller ones for exploration upon touchdown

here's an old screenshot of the early version of me base

excellent work dharak, your stuff can fly in case of emergencies!
It may fly but only one ship can dock for refuel I want to make a craft with a hitchhiker storage container to take more than the landing crew to the station.
I use Postimage.org, no account is needed and can upload as many images as I'd like.

The Ship Mars leaves on its Minmus encounter with its twin probes Phobos and Deimos. The lander will take the pilot to the colony and the probes will land at sites of interest. Phobos begins its deorbit to land at the other end of the ice lake from the city. It looks in the distance as it mother and brother leave it behind for its own mission. Edited May 6, 2013 by dharak1
